verses.kjv: I waited patiently for the LORD; and he inclined unto me, and heard my cry.
verses.ct: I waited with patience for the LORD, and he leaned down to me and listened to my cry.

verses.kjv: He brought me up also out of an horrible pit, out of the miry clay, and set my feet upon a rock, and established my goings.
verses.ct: He pulled me out of a terrible pit, out of the thick mud, and placed my feet on solid rock, giving me a firm place to stand.

verses.kjv: And he hath put a new song in my mouth, even praise unto our God: many shall see it, and fear, and shall trust in the LORD.
verses.ct: He gave me a new song to sing — a song of praise to our God. Many will witness this and stand in awe, and they will put their trust in the LORD.

verses.kjv: Blessed is that man that maketh the LORD his trust, and respecteth not the proud, nor such as turn aside to lies.
verses.ct: How happy is the person who places their confidence in the LORD, who doesn't look to the arrogant or to those who chase after lies.

verses.kjv: Many, O LORD my God, are thy wonderful works which thou hast done, and thy thoughts which are to us-ward: they cannot be reckoned up in order unto thee: if I would declare and speak of them, they are more than can be numbered.
verses.ct: LORD my God, you have done so many amazing things, and your plans for us are beyond counting. If I tried to list and describe them all, they would be too many to number.

verses.kjv: Sacrifice and offering thou didst not desire; mine ears hast thou opened: burnt offering and sin offering hast thou not required.
verses.ct: You didn't want sacrifices and grain offerings; instead, you opened my ears to listen. You didn't ask for burnt offerings or sin offerings.

verses.kjv: Then said I, Lo, I come: in the volume of the book it is written of me,
verses.ct: So I said, 'Look, here I am — in the scroll of the book it is written about me.

verses.kjv: I delight to do thy will, O my God: yea, thy law is within my heart.
verses.ct: I take great joy in carrying out your will, my God; yes, your law lives deep inside my heart.'

verses.kjv: I have preached righteousness in the great congregation: lo, I have not refrained my lips, O LORD, thou knowest.
verses.ct: I have proclaimed righteousness to the whole assembly; I have not held back my words, LORD — you know this.

verses.kjv: I have not hid thy righteousness within my heart; I have declared thy faithfulness and thy salvation: I have not concealed thy lovingkindness and thy truth from the great congregation.
verses.ct: I haven't kept your righteousness hidden inside me; I have spoken openly about your faithfulness and your salvation. I haven't concealed your loyal love and your truth from the great assembly.

verses.kjv: Withhold not thou thy tender mercies from me, O LORD: let thy lovingkindness and thy truth continually preserve me.
verses.ct: Don't hold back your compassion from me, LORD; let your loyal love and your truth always protect me.

verses.kjv: For innumerable evils have compassed me about: mine iniquities have taken hold upon me, so that I am not able to look up; they are more than the hairs of mine head: therefore my heart faileth me.
verses.ct: Countless troubles have surrounded me on every side; my sins have caught up with me until I can't even lift my head. They outnumber the hairs on my head, and my courage has completely failed.

verses.kjv: Be pleased, O LORD, to deliver me: O LORD, make haste to help me.
verses.ct: Please, LORD, rescue me! LORD, hurry to help me!

verses.kjv: Let them be ashamed and confounded together that seek after my soul to destroy it; let them be driven backward and put to shame that wish me evil.
verses.ct: Let those who are trying to destroy my life be humiliated and disgraced together; let those who want to harm me be forced to retreat in shame.

verses.kjv: Let them be desolate for a reward of their shame that say unto me, Aha, aha.
verses.ct: Let those who mock me and say, 'Ha! Ha!' be left devastated because of their disgrace.

verses.kjv: Let all those that seek thee rejoice and be glad in thee: let such as love thy salvation say continually, The LORD be magnified.
verses.ct: But let everyone who searches for you celebrate and be filled with joy because of you; let those who love your salvation always say, 'The LORD is great!'

verses.kjv: But I am poor and needy; yet the Lord thinketh upon me: thou art my help and my deliverer; make no tarrying, O my God.
verses.ct: As for me, I am weak and in need, but the Lord keeps me in his thoughts. You are my help and my rescuer — please don't delay, my God.
